definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-207" y="-46"><field name="trigger">entity_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:display_blood_counter</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Blood Count:</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:blood_amount</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##.##</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/160 oz</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">error</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_string"></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
